exceptions.exn: In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r n, w : nat Hw : w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) H : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p Unable to unify "S (?M1554 ?M1558) <= ?M1551" with "w = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r)".

In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r n, w : nat Hw : w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) Unable to unify "4 <= r" with "w = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r)".

In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r n, w : nat Hw : w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) Unable to unify "w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r)" with "w = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r)".

In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r n, w : nat Hw : w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) H : forall r : nat, 2 <= r -> forall l w : nat, w = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r) -> 1 + (r - 1) * w = power l r Unable to unify "1 + (?M1543 - 1) * ?M1546 = power ?M1545 ?M1543" with "∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r)".

In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r n, w : nat Hw : w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) Unable to unify "2 <= r" with "∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r)".

original: eapply power_decomp_is_digit. - apply Hr'. - apply Hw. - intros i Hi. rewrite Hw. apply all_ones_dio. + apply Hr. + apply Hi.
